root.name: Qin: Tomb of the Middle Kingdom
root.description: Qin: Tomb of the Middle Kingdom is an adventure game, similar to Myst, for DOS and Windows. The player is cast in the role of a researcher on an excavation of the tomb Qin Shi Huangdi, the first emperor of China. After becoming trapped in the tomb by an earthquake, the player must solve puzzles to unlock it's secrets, including the discovery of Qin's greatest obsession - the legendary elixir of eternal life.
